condition.title: Item Condition: New Other (Open Box)
details: Condition Details: Packaging may have cosmetic damage (e.g., scuffs, tears) or be non-original.
Item Status: The product itself is brand new, unused, and in pristine condition.
Quality Check: Professionally inspected and verified by our warehouse team.
Contents: 100% fully functional with all original fittings and fixtures included.
Warranty: Includes a full 12-Month Warranty for your peace of mind.

description.main_text: The Seville is a petite and simple 3 drawer chest, perfect for compact living. In a modern dark grey (Anthracite), it blends in easily with all sorts of decor. Ideal for second bedrooms and student accommodation, and it's made right here in the UK.
key_features: Made of wood effect with plastic handles.

specifications.label: Dimensions:
specifications.value: H58 x W66 x D33 cm

specifications.label: Internal Drawer:
specifications.value: H8 x W59.6 x D28.8 cm

description.note: Note: If this product is over 60cm high it must be securely attached to the wall to prevent overturning. (This unit is 58cm high).

items.label: Despatch:
items.value: Orders placed Mon-Fri before 9 AM are typically dispatched same day. Weekend orders dispatched next working day.

items.label: Bulk Items:
items.value: Shipped within 3 working days, delivered within 5.
We deliver within the UK only. Please check our shipping policy for exclusion zones.

returns.title: 14-Day Hassle-Free Returns
details: Condition: Items must be returned in original packaging.
Faulty Items: If your item arrives damaged or faulty, please contact us immediately for a replacement or refund.
